actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent a former employee in the case of United States v. Byron T. Brown, et al. (D. Ariz.) and to authorize testimony and production of documents.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Kenneth Ballen (the former chief counsel of the Special Committee on Investigations of the Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs) in the case of United States v. Byron T. Brown, et al. Authorizes Ballen to testify, and such Committee to produce documents, in such case.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent a former employee in the case of United States v. Byron T. Brown, et al. (D. Ariz.) and to authorize testimony and production of documents.
